#include <iostream>

int main (){
   int n,m;
   int t = 0;
   std::cin >> n >> m;
   int i,j;
   int tmp = 0;
   int rowN;
   for(i = 0; i < n;i++){
      tmp = 1000000003;
      for(j = 0;j < m;j++){
         std::cin >> rowN;
         if(rowN < tmp){
            tmp = rowN;
         }
      }
      if(tmp > t){
         t = tmp;
      }
   }  
   std::cout << t;
}
